attributes.action: Put 'No Deal' or 'Remain' to the people in a binding referendum
attributes.additional_details: The country needs to move on; people are fed up with this; business needs certainty one way or another; we need Government to deal with other issues and we need to stop the damage the uncertainty is doing to all aspects of our lives.
attributes.background: Most people are tired of the Brexit debate that has gone on since January 2016. The only fair way to resolve this issue is for everyone to express their view on the only two clear options that are available. Let's bring this to a close, one way or another.
